titleInfo.title: 130th Celebration of the Christian Brothers in Memphis

mods.abstract: A ceremony honoring the De La Salle Brothers' presence in Memphis was held in the Thomas Center on the 130th anniversary of the founding of Christian Brothers College. The CBU Chorale sang. Speakers included President Brother Stan Sobczyk, Brother Terence McLaughlin, and Sister Dolores Montini.
